description:
At the moment, Nova has a max concurrent build limit (10, if am not wrong) as per https://review.openstack.org/#/c/153004/

When using Kolla/devstack with single/multi-node fake compute nodes with fake libvirt driver, this limitation has to be overridden.
title: Override max_concurrent_builds constraint
